text:
to have it track file changes use the `--initial-upload` and `--remove` flags.
So the hs cli command would be
`hs watch project-folder/ project-folder --initial-upload --remove`
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cms-cli#watch>
Hello all, trying to grab assets on my sandbox instance from our production instance. Getting a CORS error. Is there anyway around this or do i need to host the files in my sandbox instance as well
I am getting this same error <@UK277PCMP> Any luck getting it to work?
Also trying to use `hs filemanager upload` and getting `Unable to upload "local_file". The post failed because "dest" was not found in portal 6398568.`
I can’t even upload these files and folder through the gui filemanager….
